doc:
Joseph Bottoms https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Bottoms 0 Joseph Bottoms (born April 22, 1954) is an American actor who won the 1975 Golden Globe Award for New Star Of The Year - Actor for his role in The Dove. He is also perhaps best known for his roles in the television mini-series Holocaust and Disney's The Black Hole. Joseph_Bottoms ( born April_22_,_1954 ) is an_American_actor who won the_1975_Golden_Globe_Award for New_Star Of The_Year - Actor for his_role in The_Dove . He is also perhaps best_known for his_roles in the_television_mini-series_Holocaust and Disney 's_The_Black_Hole .
